name: Almond Biscotti
description: Crisp, twice-baked almond biscotti, perfectly packaged for freshness. Ideal for dipping in coffee or tea.

name: Almond Khatai Box
description: A delightful box of traditional, crumbly almond shortbread cookies (Khatai). A classic Indian treat, perfectly packed.

name: Almond Khatai Fancy Box
description: Our signature almond shortbread cookies (Khatai) presented in an elegant fancy box, ensuring freshness and appeal.

name: Almond Khatai Tin
description: Delicious, melt-in-your-mouth almond shortbread cookies (Khatai) packed in a reusable, attractive tin to maintain crispness.

name: Almond Macaroon
description: Chewy and flavorful almond macaroons, carefully packaged to preserve their delicate texture and taste.

name: Arabian Sweet
description: An exquisite assortment of traditional Arabian sweets, hygienically packed to retain their authentic flavors and textures.

name: Besan Khatai
description: Traditional gram flour (besan) shortbread cookies with a unique, crumbly texture, neatly packed for your enjoyment.

name: Bread Stick Box
description: Crispy and savory breadsticks packed in a convenient box, perfect for snacking, dipping, or accompanying soups and salads.

name: Cranberry Cookies
description: Soft and chewy cookies packed with tart cranberries, often with white chocolate, hygienically packed for freshness.

name: Chips
description: Classic, crispy potato chips, lightly salted and sealed in a pack for ultimate crunch and freshness.

name: Chocolate Chip Box
description: A box full of classic, soft, and chewy chocolate chip cookies, packed to retain their delicious homemade taste.

name: Chocolate Crisp
description: Thin, delicate, and intensely chocolatey crisp biscuits, carefully packaged to maintain their snap.

name: Chocolate Walnut Biscotti
description: Crunchy biscotti generously studded with rich chocolate chunks and walnuts, securely packaged for lasting freshness.

name: Coconut Cookies
description: Buttery cookies with a delightful tropical coconut flavor, packed to preserve their aroma and crispness.

name: Countryside Biscuit
description: An assortment of rustic and wholesome countryside-style biscuits, offering a variety of flavors in a sealed pack.

name: Flax Snap
description: Healthy and crispy flaxseed snaps or crackers, a nutritious snack packed for convenience and freshness.

name: French Heart Box
description: Sweet, crispy, heart-shaped puff pastries (palmiers), also known as elephant ears, packed in a box to maintain their delicate crunch.

name: Fruit Cake Rusk
description: Deliciously crispy rusk made from rich fruit cake, packed with mixed dried fruits and sealed for lasting crispness.

name: Ginger Cake Rusk
description: Crispy and aromatic rusk made from spiced ginger cake, offering a warm flavor, packed to stay crunchy.

name: Hard Nougat
description: Classic hard nougat packed with crunchy nuts and sweetened with honey, individually wrapped or in a sealed pack.

name: Honey Nougat
description: Soft and chewy honey nougat, generously filled with almonds or other nuts, packaged to maintain its texture.

name: Kanas Chili Garlic Sauce
description: Kanas brand fiery and flavorful chili garlic sauce in a hygienically sealed bottle or jar for lasting freshness.

name: Kanas Dates Imli Chutney
description: Sweet and tangy Dates Imli (Tamarind) Chutney from Kanas, packed in a sealed bottle for authentic taste.

name: Kanas Green Chili Chutney
description: Kanas brand vibrant and spicy green chili chutney, bottled to preserve its fresh, zesty flavor.

name: Kanas Ketchup Sachet
description: A convenient retail pack of Kanas classic tomato ketchup sachets, perfect for individual servings and maintaining freshness.

name: Kanas Mayonnaise Classic
description: Creamy and smooth classic mayonnaise by Kanas, available in a sealed jar or pouch for various culinary uses.

name: Kanas Plain Paratha
description: Kanas brand ready-to-cook frozen plain parathas, packed to ensure freshness and convenience for quick meals.

name: Kanas Sriracha Sauce Bottle
description: Kanas brand Sriracha sauce in a convenient bottle, delivering a bold and spicy kick to your dishes.

name: Kanas Tomato Ketchup
description: The classic, rich, and tangy tomato ketchup from Kanas, bottled for everyday use with your favorite snacks and meals.

name: Kanas Whole wheat paratha
description: Healthy and delicious Kanas brand frozen whole wheat parathas, packed for a nutritious and easy meal option.

name: Lemon Crisp
description: Thin, zesty, and refreshing lemon-flavored crisp biscuits, carefully packaged to maintain their delightful crunch.

name: Marzipan
description: Exquisite almond marzipan confections, often artfully shaped, hygienically packed for a traditional treat.

name: Multiseed Biscotti
description: Wholesome and crunchy biscotti packed with a variety of nutritious seeds, sealed for lasting freshness and flavor.

name: Oatlay
description: Delicious and wholesome oatmeal cookies, possibly with raisins or nuts, packed to retain their texture and taste.

name: Pistachio Biscotti
description: Premium crunchy biscotti featuring the rich flavor and vibrant color of pistachios, elegantly packaged.

name: Popcorn
description: Ready-to-eat classic, fluffy popcorn, lightly salted and sealed in a bag for a perfect snack anytime.

name: Royal Biscuit Collection (Assorted)
description: An assorted collection of our fine royal biscuits, offering a variety of popular flavors in a conveniently sealed pack or box.

name: Royal Biscuit Collection 250 g
description: A 250g pack of our Royal Biscuit Collection, featuring an assortment of fine, buttery biscuits sealed for freshness.

name: Royal Biscuit Collection 500 g
description: A generous 500g pack of our Royal Biscuit Collection, offering a wider variety of exquisite biscuits, perfectly sealed.

name: Royal Biscuit Collection
description: Our premium Royal Biscuit Collection presented in an elegant, reusable tin, ensuring lasting freshness and quality.

name: Sesame Snap
description: Crisp and sweet sesame snaps or brittle, a delightful crunchy treat packed for your enjoyment.

name: Slanty
description: Light, crispy, and uniquely shaped puffed snacks, flavored with tangy or spicy seasonings, in a sealed bag.

name: Vanilla Crisp
description: Thin, delicate, and fragrant vanilla-flavored crisp biscuits, securely packaged to preserve their classic taste and crunch.
